meanings.sent1: The pillow was squashy and comfortable to rest on.
meanings.sent2: The marshmallow was so squashy that it melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: I tried to sit on the squashy beanbag chair, but it swallowed me whole!
meanings.sent4: Her squashy cheeks reminded me of ripe peaches ready to be picked.
meanings.sent5: The squashy sponge soaked up all the spilled water in seconds.

meanings.definition: To crush or squeeze with force
meanings.sent1: She squashy the grapes with her bare hands to make juice.
meanings.sent2: The wrestler tried to squashy his opponent during the match.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally squashy the plastic bottle while trying to open it.
meanings.sent4: The heavy rock squashy the delicate flower beneath it.
meanings.sent5: The chef had to squashy the garlic cloves to release their flavor.

meanings.definition: A soft, spongy material or texture
meanings.sent1: The baby played with a squashy toy that made squeaky sounds.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of the squashy material under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The clown's red nose felt squashy and made a honking sound when squeezed.
meanings.sent4: The squashy texture of the cake made it irresistible to touch.
meanings.sent5: The artist used a squashy sponge to create a unique painting technique.
